name: Fluffy 2-Step Cheesecake
author: Rebecca Hooper

ingredients.name: prepared graham cracker crumb crust (6 oz.)

instructions: Beat cream cheese and sugar in large bowl with wire whisk or electric mixer on high speed until smooth. Gently stir in whipped top- ping. Spoon into crust. Refrigerate 3 hours or until set. Spread pie filling evenly over top of pie. Store leftover cheesecake in refrigerator.
